Episodes.Title: 2 Weeks
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Cirocco Dunlap, Jeff Loveness
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: To prevent Earth's destruction, Craig, a low-level angel responsible for handling all of humanity's prayers, and fellow angel Eliza must answer a seemingly impossible prayer: help two humans, Laura and Sam, fall in love.

Episodes.Title: 13 Days
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Cirocco Dunlap, Jeff Loveness
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: God asks Sanjay to smite a famous non-believer, the real life comedian Bill Maher, while Craig and Eliza realize they have their work cut out for them when they're tasked to match a pair of oblivious soulmates.

Episodes.Title: 12 Days
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Jeff Loveness, Cirocco Dunlap
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: A troublesome human complicates Craig and Eliza's plan, while Sanjay attempts to burnish his credentials.

Episodes.Title: 6 Days
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Heather Anne Campbell, Cirocco Dunlap
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Craig helps God recruit a prophet while Sanjay heads to the basement to help save Earth.

Episodes.Title: 3 Days
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Mitra Jouhari, Gary Richardson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Rosie meets with a competitor while Craig, Eliza and Sanjay try to dupe God.

Episodes.Title: 1 Day
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Lucas Gardner, Cirocco Dunlap
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: God meets with potential investors for his groundbreaking new restaurant.

Episodes.Title: 1 Hour
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Dan Mirk, Cirocco Dunlap
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Craig risks it all in a desperate attempt to save Earth and all of mankind.
